> [ekaterina](#comment_6_1Mk5sVKeCrwMc3wSD11jM7DZTiqF5D9BaD):  Because the article I linked says they still want to add backdoors and while the Google Translation of the article you linked is barely readable it sounds like it says the same thing.

It's not clear, most of things are speculation. I'm pretty sure the author of it does not know anything about it security and probably its just a distraction from other government actions.

Yesterday they modified the draft: The key disclosure law is only applies if the message is encrypted by the service provider (not end-to-end)
